page.title: 16The Freshfield Shops (2)
page.content: Most of the trade is concentrated in the{Church Road, Ryeground Lane district. Although not the main shopping centre in Formby, it boasts a variety of shops and businesses: 1 Supermarket, 1 greengrocer, 1 take- away, 2 newsagent's, 3 hairdresser's, 1 delicatessen, 1 antique shop, 1 wool shop, 1 petrol station, 1 furniture shop, 2 restaurants, 1 hardware and building materials supplier, 1 off licence, 2 photographer's, 1 office equipment supplier, 1 dentist. Two-thirds of these advertise in Yellow Pages, the West Lancs Trader or the Formby Trader. The major foodshop is "Lo-Cost" super- market, 1 of 9 on Merseyside. A bright and friendly shop with 9 workers, it's open from 9am to 5.30pm (Mon-Wed and Sat) and till 6pm on Thursdays and 7pm on Fridays. Bread 35p, butter 48p.
